author: Krassimir Kossev
releaseNotes:
1.2.6 2022-10-16 - BEOK: time sync workaround; BEOK: temperature scientific representation bug fix; parameters number/decimal fixes; brightness and maxTemp bug fixes; heatingTemp is always rounded to 0.5; cool() does not switch the thermostat off anymore
1.2.5 2022-10-08 - BEOK: added sound on/off, tempCalibration, hysteresis, tempCeiling, setBrightness, 0.5 degrees heatingSetpoint (BEOK only); bug fixes for BEOK: Child lock, thermostatMode, operatingState
1.2.4 2022-09-28 - _TZE200_2ekuz3dz fingerprint corrected
1.2.3 2022-09-05 - added FactoryReset command (experimental, change Boolean debug = true); added AVATTO programMode preference;
1.2.2 2022-09-04 - AVATTO additional DP logging; removed Calibration command (now is as Preference parameter); replaced Initialize capability w/ custom command; degrees symbol in temp. unit; Refresh command wakes up the display'; Google Home compatibility
1.2.1 2022-04-05 - BRT-100 basic cluster warning supressed; tempCalibration, maxTemp, minTemp fixes; added Battery capability; 'Changed from device Web UI' desctiption in off() and heat() events
1.0.8 2022-04-03 - added tempCalibration; hysteresis; minTemp and maxTemp for AVATTO and BRT-100; added Battery capability for BRT-100
